LCARS: Federation Historical Database

Accessing Federation temporal archives... This comprehensive timeline maps the chronological history of the Star Trek universe, spanning from First Contact Day in 2063 to the far future of the 32nd century. Below you'll find key eras, major historical events, and the placement of each Star Trek series within the timeline.

22nd Century
23rd Century
24th Century
25th Century
32nd Century

Pre-Federation Era

2063-2161

From first contact with Vulcans to the founding of the United Federation of Planets

Series in this era:

  • Enterprise

Key Events:

First Contact Day
2063

Zefram Cochrane's first warp flight attracts the attention of the Vulcans.

Launch of Enterprise NX-01
2151

Earth's first warp 5 capable starship begins its mission of exploration.

Earth-Romulan War begins
2155

A devastating conflict that eventually leads to the founding of the Federation.

Federation Founding
2161

Earth, Vulcan, Andoria, and Tellar sign the Federation Charter.

Early Federation

2161-2233

The formative years of the Federation and Starfleet

Key Events:

NX-01 Enterprise decommissioned
2165

The historic vessel is retired and later preserved in a museum.

Birth of Spock
2222

Spock is born to Sarek and Amanda Grayson on Vulcan.

USS Kelvin Incident
2233

In the prime timeline, the USS Kelvin encounters a spatial anomaly.

Attack on the USS Kelvin
2233

Attack on the USS Kelvin involving multiple parties.

Constitution-Class Era

2233-2293

The golden age of exploration led by Constitution-class starships

Series in this era:

  • Discovery
  • Strange New Worlds
  • The Animated Series
  • The Original Series

Key Events:

Captain Pike commands Enterprise
2254

The USS Enterprise NCC-1701 explores the galaxy under Captain Pike.

Attack on Krall's base
2263

Attack on Krall's base involving multiple parties.

Attack on Yorktown
2263

Attack on Yorktown involving multiple parties.

Kirk's Five-Year Mission begins
2265

Captain Kirk takes command of the Enterprise for its historic five-year mission.

Battle of the Mutara Nebula
2285

The Enterprise confronts Khan, resulting in the death of Spock.

Khitomer Accords
2293

Historic peace treaty between the Federation and the Klingon Empire.

Mid Federation Era

2293-2364

A period of relative peace and continued expansion

Series in this era:

  • The Next Generation

Key Events:

Tomed Incident
2311

A confrontation with the Romulans leads to the Treaty of Algeron.

USS Enterprise-C destruction
2344

The ship is destroyed defending a Klingon outpost from Romulans.

Battle of Maxia
2355

Captain Picard's first encounter with the Ferengi.

Galaxy-Class Era

2364-2379

The era of Galaxy-class starships and renewed exploration

Series in this era:

  • Deep Space Nine
  • The Next Generation
  • Voyager

Key Events:

Enterprise-D launched
2364

The new flagship of the Federation begins its mission.

Battle of Wolf 359
2367

The Federation suffers a devastating defeat against the Borg.

Discovery of the Bajoran Wormhole
2369

A stable wormhole to the Gamma Quadrant is discovered near Bajor.

Attack on Bryma
2370

Attack on Bryma involving multiple parties.

USS Voyager lost in Delta Quadrant
2371

Voyager is pulled 70,000 light-years from Federation space.

Dominion War begins
2373

The Federation enters a devastating conflict with the Dominion.

Dominion War ends
2375

The Alliance defeats the Dominion, ending the war.

Shinzon Incident
2379

Reman uprising against the Romulan Star Empire.

Post-Nemesis Era

2380-2401

The aftermath of the Dominion War and relations with the Romulan Empire

Series in this era:

  • Lower Decks
  • Picard

Key Events:

Romulan Supernova
2387

The Romulan sun goes supernova, destroying Romulus.

Picard leaves retirement
2399

Jean-Luc Picard embarks on a mission to help Romulan refugees.

Reunion of Enterprise-D crew
2401

Former Enterprise officers reunite for one final mission.

32nd Century

3188-3190

Far future era after 'The Burn' devastated the Federation

Series in this era:

  • Discovery (S3+)

Key Events:

The Burn
3069

A catastrophic event causes dilithium to become inert, crippling warp travel.

USS Discovery arrives
3188

The Discovery arrives from the 23rd century via time travel.

Federation Restoration begins
3189

Efforts to reconnect the remaining Federation worlds.

Timeline data collected from Federation temporal archives and STAPI, the comprehensive Star Trek API.
